title: Game stuck at 500 ping Attempting to Reconnect
body:
I'm currently in a normal game where everyone is stuck at 500 ping and attempting to reconnect - except for an enemy Thresh and Corki it seems. 
We were about 1 minute in when it started lagging heavily, and after about 10-15 seconds, the screen froze and turned sepia. We then all started walking to base. 
I seem to be doing the best out of all my teammates, and the one time the enemy Thresh unpaused the game, I was first to reconnect. I even thought at first that Thresh was a member of Rito (yeah how dumb), until the enemy Corki started going "WTF this Thresh... he can pause and unpause the game... Thresh... WTF" before it froze again. 
I tried '/resume,' and it worked, but only after quite a long period of time. During then I moved a bit and the Corki sent a few more "WTF..." messages before I was back to 'attempting to reconnect.' This happened a few more times and now I'm back at base, while on my frozen screen Thresh and Corki are at our tower and pushing? Most likely. 
I've asked quite a few people if their games are working, and theirs are completely fine. 
If this really is Thresh's doing - well it's unfair obviously and a bloody boring game ._. 
Someone offer a solution please? I'll love you forever <3.

EDIT: So I just realised the screen was on the 'skip waiting for stat's thing, and when I looked at my match history there was nothing there. TFW? 30 minutes of my time wasted. Is there anyone out there who has an explanation?

replies.body:
During a custom game, you can pause it by issuing the /pause command and having the majority of people vote "Yes". In match-made games, the game will automatically pause if all summoners have disconnected. The game will decease if none of them reconnect.

The servers are crap, in essence.
Can confirm. Jumps to like 2000ms then stays on 500ms and gets stuck on "Attempting to Reconnect".
